data.persona: My tribe is my life. We gathering, hunt and sing. I live a free man, not hiding behind a wall.
data.description:
You are in the A cursed grave.
The sun never seems to shine on this grave.  The letters on the tombstone have long since faded, and many stories are told about whose bones lay buried in the dirt.  Until recently, it was overgrown with grass and weeds.  Someone had come and cleared the weeds, and the dirt looked as if it had been turned over.
There's a Bone, a dirt, and a flower here.
The caretaker is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want the caretaker to lead the way
data.mid_motivation: I hope to discover the secrets of the cursed grave today
data.long_motivation: I hope to continue travelling the country with my tribe until winter
